packageRules.description: Pin tailwindcss to v3.x until Next.js fully supports v4 - remove this rule when upgrading to Next.js 15+
Pin @tailwindcss/postcss out - not needed for tailwind v3 - remove this rule when upgrading to tailwind v4
Pin eslint to v8.x until Next.js 14 is upgraded - remove this rule when upgrading to Next.js 15+
Pin eslint-config-next to match Next.js version - remove this rule when upgrading Next.js
